code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./ReportsLayout.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReportsLayout=()=>{const[reports,setReports]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchReports();},[]);const fetchReports=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:3001/reviews");if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();setReports(data);}else{throw new Error("Failed to fetch reports");}}catch(error){console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reports-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Reports"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"reports-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Serial Number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Doctor Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Doctor Specialty"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"View Report"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Download Report"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:reports.map((report,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:index+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:report.doctorName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:report.speciality}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:report.report,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"view-btn",children:"View Report"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:report.report,download:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"download-btn",children:"Download Report"})})})]},report.id))})]})]});};export default ReportsLayout;
